imdb.title: Knight's & Magic
imdb.plot: Ernesti, a programmer and mecha fan in his previous life, is reincarnated in a fantasy world where he sets out to pilot a humanoid weapon.

episodes.title: War & Princess
episodes.plot: The Jarodek forces have captured the princesses, and before any operation can begin they need to be rescued! Ernie leads a group of four on a mission to rescue them, using the human-sized Silhoutte Gears.

episodes.title: Hit & Away
episodes.plot: Ernie repels the Bronze Fang Ambush, but now the Jarodeks know where Eleonora is. Can Ernie hold off their levitate ships?

episodes.title: Knight & Dragon
episodes.plot: The Jarodeks launch a counterattack with a powerful flying wyvern mech. Ernie fights back, but his foe this time is far smarter than before, and has a new trap that can defeat even the Ikaruga!

episodes.title: Heaven & Earth
episodes.plot: After two draws, it's time for the final showdown against the Vyver! The capital city is almost at hand, and all that remains for the Western Grand STorm to come to a close is for Ernie to defeat the huge wyvern mech.

episodes.title: New & Old
episodes.plot: Ernesti's new mech, the Tzendolg, along with his Telestales are paired off against the Kaldatoah Darsch. Several Darsch are paired against a single mech, putting the Silver Phoenix at a serious disadvantage before the fight even begins.

episodes.title: Secret & Quest
episodes.plot: A horde of powerful demon beasts are heading for Alfheim, the center of the nation's Silhouette Knight reactor design. If Ernesti can save them, he'll finally be able to design his own mech from the ground up!

episodes.title: Force & Justice
episodes.plot: The powerful Jarodek empire is attacking the Occident countries in an attempt to unify their side of the mountains. When things get out of hand, it's a perfect opportunity for Ernesti to try out his new mech!

episodes.title: Light and Shadow
episodes.plot: Ernesti continues his work on the new mech: The Telestale. The new mech has serious design flaws, but even before things can be fully fixed, he's summoned by the Marquis Dixgard, a powerful lord with an interest in the young boy's work.

episodes.title: Hide & Seek
episodes.plot: The new mechs are to be sent to Fort Casadeus, where the powerful Marquis Dixgard will take personal command over them. But on the way, a group of raiders lure demon beasts into attacking the convoy, hoping to steal them for their own.

episodes.title: Trial & Error
episodes.plot: With the Casadeus incident resolved, it's time for work on the Telestale to be completed. Meanwhile, the Silhouette Knight Laboratory is trying to make a copy of their own! Will Ernesti's designs turn out as powerful as they seem?

episodes.title: Robots & Fantasy
episodes.plot: A young genius programmer has a passion for building model robots. After dying in a car accident, he finds himself reincarnated in a world where robots are real, and he can pilot and build them!

episodes.title: Hero & Beast
episodes.plot: A huge behemoth is rampaging through the forest on its way toward the capital, and only Ernesti can stop it. He "borrows" a Silhouette Knight from one of the other students and goes off to face it, but he's so tiny his feet can't even reach the pedals!

episodes.title: Scrap & Build
episodes.plot: After defeating the Behemoth, Ernesti goes to the cpaital to be rewarded. But the king is cautious about this new child who can take down a monster that easily defeats armies, and sets for him a difficult task before his reward can be given.
